trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representerer delt tilkobling-versjonen av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> tjenesten som brukes av kjøretiden.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: I denne konteksten betyr delt tilkobling at tjenesten bruker samme SQL-tilkobling for sporingen og utholdenhet tjenester.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Tjenesten SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService brukes for databasetransaksjoner som bruker en delt tilkobling mellom andre objekter.

trans-unit.source: To use the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bruke SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService i stedet for den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>i din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>forekomst, må du bruke den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the SQL server used by the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Hvis SQL-serveren som brukes av SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService er nede for eksempel som skyldes SQL-klyngeressurs failovers eller forbigående nettverksproblemer, SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService vil prøve på nytt commit-prosessen opptil 20 ganger før opprettet en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>hendelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren aktiveres når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren laster tjenester fra en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig nøkkelen er `EnableRetries`.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Dette forespørsler som i <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> på nytt hvis det skulle oppstå en mislykket databasetilkobling.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av en database-tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Database-tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Får eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> vil prøve på nytt under lagring av en jobb-bunke.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Forsøk arbeid bunke utfører for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>aktiviteter må være basert på arbeidsflyten (vanligvis bruker litt løkke og unntak behandlingsprogrammet utenfor den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>ikke gjøre nye forsøk i dette tilfellet fordi den ikke ble startet (og derfor ikke eier) transaksjonen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til angis programmatisk, kan denne funksjonen aktiveres i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du angir denne egenskapen til en konfigurasjonsfil [arbeidsflyten konfigurasjonsfiler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Generell informasjon om prøver på nytt arbeid satsvise transaksjoner, kan du se [bunkebehandling statusinformasjon i arbeidsflyter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis tjenesten skal prøve å utføre satsvise jobben; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden kalles når kjøretiden arbeidsflyten opphøyer den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden kalles for å starte tjenesten.
